title: て-Form
description: Learn how to change verbs into the て-form. This is the foundation for many important grammar patterns.

title: 〜てください
description: Use the て-form with ください to make polite requests.

title: Chaining Actions with て
description: Use the て-form to connect two actions that happen in sequence.

title: 〜てもいいです — Asking for and Giving Permission
description: Learn how to ask for and give permission using the て-form.

title: 〜てはいけません — Prohibiting Actions
description: Use the て-form to say something is not allowed or prohibited.
